sn52.14:4.1: “… And it’s because of developing and cultivating these four kinds of mindfulness meditation that I understand the minds of other beings and individuals, having comprehended them with my mind.
sn52.14:4.2: I understand mind with greed as ‘mind with greed’ …
sn52.14:4.3: I understand unfreed mind as ‘unfreed mind’.”
